detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract AirDrop (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#94-127) has payable functions:
	 - AirDrop.sendAirDrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#111-116)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [AirDrop](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#L94-L127) has payable functions:
	 - [AirDrop.sendAirDrop()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#L111-L116)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: AirDrop.sendAirDrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#111-116) ignores return value by token.transfer(msg.sender,valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#115)

AirDrop.multisend(address[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#117-125) ignores return value by token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#122)

AirDrop.setValueAirDrop(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#104-106) should emit an event for: 
	- valueAirDrop = _valueAirDrop (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#105)

AirDrop.setTokenAddress(address)._address (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#107) lacks a zero-check on :
		- tokenAddress = _address (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#108)

AirDrop.multisend(address[]) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#117-125) has external calls inside a loop: token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#122)
detectors.markdown: [AirDrop.multisend(address[])](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#L117-L125) has external calls inside a loop: [token.transfer(_addressDestination[i],valueAirDrop)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#L122)

detectors.description: Pragma version0.4.25 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirDrop__2.sol#1) allows old versions
solc-0.4.25 is not recommended for deployment
